description:
In this course we will cover all the bases needed for doing effective work with Laravel 4.2 and the knowledge gained in this project will serve as a great base for literally any type of application you want to create with Laravel.

Even though Laravel 5 is out, many developers including myself prefer to stick with 4.2, though if you really want it shouldn't be too hard to convert this project to Laravel 5.

We will cover crud functionalities (that is database manipulation, creating, reading, updating and deleting from the database), routing, ajax, creating and using custom helper classes and more, all from scratch.
title: Laravel 4 Project - Creating a CMS
